mapper.update: update process_schedule_plan set biz_no = #{bizNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, node_name = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exec_time = #{execTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exec_counts = #{execCounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, biz_no, process_instance_id, node_name, exec_time, exec_counts, status, create_time, modified_time from process_schedule_plan where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, biz_no, process_instance_id, node_name, exec_time, exec_counts, status, create_time, modified_time from process_schedule_plan
